sourcesContent:
import React,{useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import products from '../products' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' export default function ProductPage() { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ async function fetchProduct(){ const { id } = useParams(); const {data} = await axios.get(`/api/products/${products.find((p) => p._id == id)}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() },[]) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: Rs.{product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: Rs.{product.price} Status: {product.countInStock>0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock"}
) }
